— That is also my victim! he exclaimed In
his murder my crimes are consummated — the
miserable series of my being is wound to its close!
O Frankenstein – generous & self devoted being
what does it avail that I ask thee now to
pardon me. Wherefore do I seek to perish
in thy stead after I have irretrievably des-
-troyed thee, by destroying those thou lovedst
Alas he is cold.. he may not answer me.

His voice seemed suffocated, & my first im
-pulses which had suggested to me the duty
of obeying the dying request of my friend,
in destroying his enemy, now were suspended
by a mixture of curiosity & compassion.

I approached this tremendous being– I dared
not again raise my looks upon his face—
there was something so scaring & unearth-
-ly in his ugliness. I attempted to speak,
but his presence was as a burthen which
held me dumb, & the words died on my
lips—. The monster continued to utter
